## setValue() function

Sets a value on a view model

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setValue<V>(model: ValueSource<any, V>, value: V): V;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  model | [ValueSource](./tweak-ui.valuesource.md)<!-- -->&lt;any, V&gt; | The model of a component |
|  value | V | The value for the component |

<b>Returns:</b>

V

result of [getValue()](./tweak-ui.getValue.md) after the value has been set
